room_title: Escape room "Pirates of the Dark Sea" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
room_address: 1490 N Oakland Blvd, Waterford Twp, MI 48327
room_description: The evil captain of your ship has managed to capture a Mermaid from the long lost city of Atlantis. You were thrown in the brig for trying to help her escape so she could warn her people of your arrival. The captain is fast asleep and your time is short. Break free, save the Mermaid and protect the city of Atlantis.
